sentences.sContent: My daughter painted a scarlet bear on the windscreen of our car.
sentences.sContent_eng: My daughter painted a scarlet bear on the windscreen of our car.
sentences.sCn: 我女儿在我们的挡风玻璃上画了一只鲜红的小熊。

sentences.sContent: As she was thrown forward, the cake went right through the windscreen and landed on the road.
sentences.sContent_eng: As she was thrown forward, the cake went right through the windscreen and landed on the road.
sentences.sCn: 当她由于惯性向前一冲的时候，蛋糕被甩出了挡风玻璃，落到马路上。

sentences.sContent: A single piece of glass stretches from the hood to the rear, acting as hood, windscreen, roof, and rear window.
sentences.sContent_eng: A single piece of glass stretches from the hood to the rear, acting as hood, windscreen, roof, and rear window.
sentences.sCn: 一整块玻璃覆盖从引擎盖到车的后部，可以充当引擎盖，挡风玻璃，天窗和后窗。

phrases.pCn: 挡风玻璃刮水器；风档雨雪刷

trans.tranOther: the large window at the front of a car, bus etc
